com.maverick.nio
Class Event

java.lang.Object
  com.maverick.events.EventObject
      com.maverick.events.Event
          com.maverick.nio.Event

public class Event
extends com.maverick.events.Event

Superclass of all events that may be fired during the life of SSHD.

All events have the following attributes in common :-

  • Event code. This is an int and must be unique across the whole of SSHD.
  • State. A boolean specifying whether the event is the result of a successful operation or a failed one.
